name: Brinicle
skill: Deals 1671/2051 DMG to current target, with a high chance of inflicting Freeze.
ability: Normal attacks have a slight chance of inflicting Freeze.

additional_data.description: A spirit who turns everything she touches into a freezing icicle. She exudes a coldness that freezes everything around her even though she doesn't mean to. It's extremely dangerous just to touch her—if you're lucky, the only thing that happens is your body freezing over. No matter how high the temperature is, her coldness never lets up. There's no end to the number of people she's inadvertently frozen in place on a hot summer's day.

main: "Be careful. I don't want you to die."
skill: "One touch and it's all over... Try me."
summon: "Are you sure? Just standing next to me is dangerous, you know."
limit_break: "I've got to learn to control this someday..."
